variable_instance_exists: With this function you can check whether an instance scope variable exists or not. You supply the unique instance ID value (which can be found from the Instance Properties in the room editor, or is returned when you call the function instance_create_layer()) as well as the variable name to check for as a string (see example code below). The function will return true if a variable with the given name exists for the instance and false otherwise.
The unique ID value of the instance to check
The name of the variable to check for (as a string)
